title: Selecting Bard Bloom will turn you blue regardless of what color you selected. [Client?]
body:
Whenever I select green or gold Bard Bloom chroma pack colors, I am always turned blue. Happens 100% of the time for me. 


Not a big deal just thought I'd let you know.

replies.body:
Heyo, Cllorox!

First off, sorry that you're experiencing this problem. Would you mind providing me some more details about your situation?

What mode do you experience this on? Are you playing solo or with others? If you select a different Bard skin (even just classic Bard) in Champ Select and then switch to a chroma, do you still experience this issue?

Have you experienced this before? 

Have you tried patching your client already?

Thanks a bunch! Hopefully we can get this issue sorted out for you quickly. :]

UPDATE!

I just played a normal draft and successfully changed my chroma color to green. 

The next game I played a team builder and selected gold, but when the game loaded up I was green instead of blue.

Seems to have something to do with differences in normal selection and team builder. 

Hope that helps!

Hey LoveStrut, 

I've experienced this the most in team builder (gotta practice that Bard before the season starts!) and I can click on either green or gold, but when the game starts I'm always blue. I can use the original classic Bard skin with no problems at all. 

This is the first chroma I've bought and this has never happened before and my client is patched and up to date. I'm not sure if this impacts other chroma packs, but for Bard its a 100% blue, blue life.

If I can provide anything else that would be helpful, just let me know!
